name: iPhone 13
desc: The iPhone 13 introduces the latest A15 Bionic chip, a stunning 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, and an advanced dual-camera system for capturing remarkable photos and videos.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
desc: Experience cutting-edge technology with the Samsung Galaxy S21. It features a powerful Exynos 2100 processor, a vibrant 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, and a versatile triple-camera setup.

name: Google Pixel 6
desc: The Google Pixel 6 is equipped with the revolutionary Tensor processor, offering incredible AI capabilities. Capture stunning photos with the powerful dual 50 MP camera system.

name: iPhone SE
desc: The iPhone SE (2nd generation) combines the power of the A14 Bionic chip with the classic design of the iPhone. Enjoy a compact size with impressive performance.

name: OnePlus 9
desc: Unleash the power of the OnePlus 9 with the Snapdragon 888 processor and a stunning 6.55-inch Fluid AMOLED display. Capture pro-grade photos with the Hasselblad triple-camera system.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11
desc: Experience the Xiaomi Mi 11 with a large 6.81-inch AMOLED display and a powerful Snapdragon 888 processor. Capture detailed shots with the impressive 108 MP triple-camera setup.

name: iPhone 12
desc: The iPhone 12 combines 5G capability with the A14 Bionic chip and a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display. Capture vivid photos and videos with the dual-camera system.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3
desc: Immerse yourself in the future with the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3. Its foldable design, Snapdragon 888 processor, and dual 12 MP cameras redefine smartphone innovation.

name: Google Pixel 5a
desc: The Google Pixel 5a offers reliable performance with the Snapdragon 765G and a large 6.34-inch OLED display. Capture stunning photos with the dual 12.2 MP camera.
